thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-NCI Building Systems Q1 Adjusted Non-Gaap Eps $0.14 Excluding Items

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-NCI Building Systems Q1 Adjusted Non-Gaap Eps $0.14 Excluding Items
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - NCI Building Systems Inc:
* NCI BUILDING SYSTEMS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $430 MILLION TO $450 MILLION * AT QUARTER END, TOTAL CONSOLIDATED BACKLOG INCREASED TO $569.9 MILLION, UP 8.1% YEAR-OVER-YEAR
* FOR Q2 OF FISCAL 2018, NCI EXPECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE IN RANGE OF $29 MILLION TO $39 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.10, REVENUE VIEW $402.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $436.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
